newsitem.title: USA: Immune Response offers 2.2 mln shrs $6.50.
newsitem.headline: Immune Response offers 2.2 mln shrs $6.50.

text.p: Immune Response Corp's 2.2 million share public offering of common stock was priced at $6.50 per share, the company said.

Bayer AG unit Bayer Corp has indicated it will purchase 615,400 shares. All of the shares are being sold by the company. Immune Response, a biopharmaceutical company, has granted the underwriters an option to purchase an additional 330,000 shares to cover over-allotments.
The offering is being managed by Hanifen, Imhoff Inc and Cruttenden Roth Inc.
